content: आरूढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Mounted, ascended; seated on; आरूढो वृक्षो भवता <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> used actively; आरूढमद्रीन् <ls>R. 6. 77</ls>; <ls>Me. 8</ls>, <ls n="Me.">18</ls>; <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; so वृक्षं, नावं, हयं, रथं &c.; चक्र°, दोला°. {@--2@} Raised up, elevated on high. {@--3@} Arisen, produced. --ढं Ascending, mounting; see अत्यारूढ.
